channel.title: General on Biscuits in Tea...!
channel.description: Recent content in General on Biscuits in Tea...!

item.title: Welcome! A note from the (b | m)aker...
item.description: Hi dear Friend! :simple_smile: This is a footnote.1 Welcome to my little site, where I would like to discuss and ‘share’ little nuggets of beauty or lessons that I learned about and/or ‘experienced’ during my on-going journey to know more about the Art & Science of Programming in particular. Occasionally, it might contain my ramblings on some other topics too. Why call this “biscuits in tea” (b.i.t.) ? A “bit”—pun intended—of explanation about the name is in order.
